articles.title: Lynn police officer on leave after becoming ‘suddenly incapacitated’ while on duty
articles.description:
Video posted on social media shows the Lynn police officer not responding to questions, blinking slowly, and struggling to stand.

The post Lynn police officer on leave after becoming ‘suddenly incapacitated’ while on duty appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Lynn police officer became incapacitated while on duty, as shown in social media video.
Officer is currently on leave pending investigation into the incident.
Local residents concerned about police officer's health and safety protocols.

articles.title: Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled against the Raiders
articles.description:
Harold Landry brought lots of pressure, but the Patriots folded in the home opener.

The post Patriots stock watch: Here’s who stood out and struggled against the Raiders appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots lost their home opener against the Raiders on September 7, 2025.
Harold Landry applied significant pressure, highlighting defensive struggles.
Local fans express disappointment as team fails to capitalize on home advantage.

articles.title: ICE has begun immigration crackdown in Massachusetts
articles.description:
The operation includes Boston, whose mayor has drawn the administration’s ire for speaking out against the growing scale of its immigration actions.

The post ICE has begun immigration crackdown in Massachusetts appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: ICE has initiated an immigration crackdown across Massachusetts, including Boston.
Boston Mayor Michelle Wu has criticized the federal administration's immigration actions.
Local immigrant communities may face increased fear and uncertainty due to these operations.
